name: Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to discover nodes of the MSK cluster. Otherwise, returns `OK`.

name: Amazon Kafka prometheus health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the check cannot access a Metrics endpoint. Otherwise, returns `OK`.

name: OpenMetrics endpoint health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`.
